description: Local WordPress environment starts via wp-env
steps: Open the local WordPress site started by wp-env

description: Plugin can be activated without warnings/notices/fatal errors
steps: Install the plugin in a WordPress site
Verify there are no fatal errors
Verify there are no PHP warnings/notices triggered on activation

description: Hello Ralph block appears in the block inserter
steps: Verify a block named 'Hello Ralph' is available

description: Hello Ralph block can be inserted, saved, and persists after editor reload
steps: Insert the 'Hello Ralph' block into a post
Verify the block is still present and renders correctly in the editor

description: Editor preview shows the expected 'Hello Ralph' content
steps: Verify the block displays the expected text/content in the editor

description: Front-end renders the expected 'Hello Ralph' content
steps: View the post on the front-end
Verify the 'Hello Ralph' content is visible and correct

description: PHP checks pass (composer lint and composer test via PHPUnit + Brain Monkey)
steps: Verify the command exits successfully and runs PHPUnit + Brain Monkey tests

description: Block assets build successfully (npm run build)
steps: Verify the command exits successfully and produces block build artifacts
